features: Compatible with iPhone Xs AND iPhone X
Multi-layer defense: solid inner shell and soft outer cover (NO BUILT IN SCREEN PROTECTOR)
Belt-clip holster included that doubles as a kickstand for hands-free media viewing
Port covers keep out dust and debris
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details)
body.description: Worry less while you’re working, adventuring and living when you defend your device against drops, dirt and scrapes. The new Screenless Edition Defender Series is specifically designed for the iPhone X touchscreen. Combining a solid internal shell with a resilient outer slipcover, Defender Series deflects the action and accidents that come your way every day. Plus, the included holster doubles as a kickstand for hands-free viewing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OtterBox Defender Series for iPhone Xs and iPhone X

Defender Series | iPhone Xs/iPhone X Defend your device from drops, dirt and daily adventures Defender Series Screenless Edition for iPhone Xs/iPhone X works hard and plays harder. The multi-layer construction guards your device from serious drops, dirt, scrapes and bumps. The included holster can be used as a belt clip or hands-free kickstand. The screenless design offers full access to your screen and it’s compatible with anti-shatter Alpha Glass so your display remains pristine and protected. Defender Series Screenless Edition delivers toughness in a rugged and refined design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Otter Bic protects all my electronics very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great case, especially for blue collar workers. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slimmer Version but Durable
reviews.reviewText: This Otterbox is much improved from earlier versions. It is slimmer and not so heavy and bulky. The multi layer protection is great and my phone has dropped a few times without any problems at all. The clip holder is bigger and adds a bulkiness, but it makes for a hand free phone to carry.The directions were a little vague, so the You Tube video tutorial helped much better. Installation ended up being easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I expected this is my second one . They truly protect my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product - As described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought this as a gift
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a birthday present for my bro. He's always been an iPhone guy whereas I prefer Samsung. He really liked it and it seems to work great for protection against being dropped, although he's always been super careful not to drop his phone so it hasn't happened yet. Nice colors, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have used these for all my phones
reviews.reviewText: I have used these for all my phones And they are great for convenience and protection of the phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use for iPhone X max
reviews.reviewText: I have anger issues and well … I have threw my phone on more then one occasion while having arguments over the phone don’t judge me lmao but we all know how iPhones are easy to break and well I’m here to inform you my phone has yet to break or even get a cracked screen and I don’t even have a screen protector on it just the otter box I’m more then sure if you drop a phone from a 10 story roof it will still be intact with this otter box on I mean if my phone can survive me being in a fit of rage and being thrown as hard as I can throw over some marriage problems I’m sure your phone will survive a accidental drop or two even from a roof I’m most certain y’all get my 5 stars I have had this otter box I think going on 3 years now and just now starting to need a new one as the rubber is falling apart now where the charging flappy thing is hope this helps if in doubt always get a otter box just wish they were more prettier options to choose from
Es una funda robusta que protege bastante bien el equipoOjo no es contra agua 😉

reviews.reviewTitle: The best Iphone protector in the market.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product as a replacement of my previous OtterBox Defender, which protected my phone for the last 3 years. I have owned LifeProof brand as well, however, I must say that I'm impressed by the durability and protection offered by this particular model, since my phone have fallen several times from random heights and this protector has been able to keep my phone intact. I highly suggest this defender series not only for Iphone, but for any other brand, it really worth what I paid. Considering phones nowadays cost around 1000$, the cost of this protector will pay itself.
Die Hülle sieht super aus, das Handy liegt nun super und sicher in der Hand. Ich bin sehr zufrieden

Love the case! Nothing like an otter box to keep a phone safe though I do wish It included a glass front protector as for the x there is no front. I do notice the rubber coming off in little tiny shreds from the bottom of the base. Doesn’t affect overall use. Would buy again.
